actions.name: Bite
actions.description: On hit, target grappled (escape DC 17) and restrained; remorhaz can't bite another target while grappling.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description: Bites a grappled Medium or smaller target; on hit, target also takes bite damage and is swallowed. Swallowed target blinded/restrained with total cover, takes 21 (6d6) acid at start of remorhaz's turns. If it takes 30+ damage in a turn from inside, must make DC 15 CON save or regurgitate at end of turn; on death, swallowed creatures can exit using 15 ft. movement, prone.
